name: GMTKJam 2020 - Absurd Chess
description:
GMTK Jam 2020 Submission

Chess, but nonsense!

  • Random piece selected to move each turn
  • Randomly assigned a method of moving (Pawn moving like a Knight? Okay!)
  • You just pick the final result!

It'll fall over after a few turns because what is a game jam without bugs, but the thought is there?
